result.title: Report on broader environmental benefits
result.description: This task relates to T3.2. The environmental and operational benefits will be calculated and, to the extent possible, demonstrated. They will include decarbonisation (including GHG reduction), local air quality, particulate matter reduction and fuel efficiency benefits. They also include socio-economic benefits such as job creation through the establishment of SAF supply chains. Indicator of success: Benefits calculated and demonstrated (to the extent possible). Report ready.

result.title: Project webpage
result.description: The deliverable will release the iSPLASH website where will be detailed the site purpose and strategy the results of the conducted research of the latest web design trends the timing for improving along the way the iSPLASH web site eg monthly for updating sections video news events testimonials customers interview conferences exhibitions financial events and the web monitoring strategy adopted The web site will also have a private section for the Advisory Board as also for all key supplier where to drag and drop documents and metafiles Employees are all connected by intranet and there will be a special section for the employees suggestion andor complaints with the possibility also to be anonymous
